alert.note: Alert for Paulding; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 03 at 8:09PM EST until March 04 at 9:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... The Flood Watch continues for * portions of northern Indiana and northwest Ohio, including the following areas, in northern Indiana, Adams, Allen IN, Blackford, Grant, Jay, and Wells. In northwest Ohio, Allen OH, Defiance, Henry, Paulding, Putnam, and Van Wert. * Until midnight EST tonight * WHEN...Until Midnight EST tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
